secondaries.shortDescription: Score points at the end of battle depending on what units the Thousand Sons PSYKER killed

subObjectives.description: For each enemy PSYKER CHARACTER unit that was destroyed in the Psychic phase by a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army.
for each other enemy PSYKER unit that was destroyed in the Psychic phase by a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army.
for each other enemy unit that was destroyed in the Psychic phase by a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER unit from your army

secondaries.shortDescription: Only if your opponent's army includes 1+ PSYKER unit. Block his actions.

subObjectives.description: THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units from your army manifested at least one Witchfire power this battle round, and manifested more Witchfire powers than enemy units did this battle round.
THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units from your army manifested at least one Blessing power this battle round, and manifested more Blessing powers than enemy units did this battle round.
THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units from your army manifested at least one Malediction power this battle round, and manifested more Malediction powers than enemy units did this battle round.

secondaries.shortDescription: THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units can attempt Mutate Landscape (Psychic Action - Warp charge 4)

subObjectives.description: each time a unit from your army completes this psychic action.

secondaries.shortDescription: THOUSAND SONS INFANTRY units can attempt Burn Empires (From end of Movement phase to next command phase)

subObjectives.description: each time a unit from your army completes this action.
